# isBidiMirrored

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value indicating whether the scalar is mirrored in bidirectional text.

## Declaration

```swift
var isBidiMirrored: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

This property corresponds to the “Bidi_Mirrored” property in the [http://www.unicode.org/versions/latest/].
